extendedInfo.description: Let your phone work for you. CritiCall might be the most important app you get for your Android phone.Tired of your phone waking you up in the middle of the night? Do you turn your phone to silent but worry about missing an emergency call from your kids, parents, significant other? Afraid to turn the volume on your phone down for fear youâll miss that call or text from an important client?âFortunately, with CritiCall, those worries become a thing of the past.â â Android Authority, 10/21/12Rest easy and sleep peacefully knowing youâll never miss a critical call or text again. Set critical contacts so your phone will ring when those contacts call or text, even when your phone is on silent. CritiCall is relied on by members of search and rescue teams, expectant fathers, people with older or sick family members, parents, and business professionals to ensure they never miss âthatâ call.âCritiCall solved one of the most obvious problems with modern smartphones: the lack of a selective silent feature.â â Android Police, 2/6/13One of Android Guys' "10 Apps and Games Worth Exploring" â 1/31/13	FEATURES Ò Receive important calls and texts, even when your phone is on silent Ò Scheduler lets you customize when certain contacts can reach you Ò âNo Worryâ Auto-Resume feature lets you turn CritiCall off for those times you absolutely cannot have your phone ring, and automatically turns CritiCall back on for you. Ò Unlimited groups lets you customize settings for more than one person at a time Ò Customizable ringtones/notifications Ò Emergency Call Override rings your phone when the same person calls you more than once within 5 minutes (Pro Feature) Ò Adjustable Repeating Reminders ensures you never miss an important call or text even when you are away from your phone for a time (Pro Feature)Our e-mail is simplyapplied@gmail.com. We take customer service very seriously and typically respond to all emails within 24 hours, usually faster.We are committed to providing a high quality application that exceeds your expectations and makes your phone more useful for you. Please let us know if you have any issues with our app so we can address the issue. Recent comments from customers:âThank you for the level of customer service yâall have showed me.  That level of service is rare these days.  Especially with a 2$ product...â â 1/23/13âThank you so much I really appreciate all that you've done and help work with me on the issues that I was havingâ â 1/8/13â... actually you have been the best with the updates and keeping me posted...awesome service...â â 12/11/12âI really have been very happy with the program. Works the best of all I have tried. And the support has no competition!â â 12/11/12We welcome suggestions for new features and value our customerâs comments highly in our decision-making process. If youâre unhappy with our app in any way, please give us a chance to fix the issue before leaving negative comments. We canât respond to these comments and many times the issues listed are either out of our control or easy to fix. We will make every reasonable effort to fix your problem.LEGAL STUFFDue to the number of factors which can impact performance of apps on mobile phones,  SIMPLY APPLIED DOES NOT MAKE ANY GUARANTEES, EITHER EXPLICIT OR IMPLIED, THAT CRITICALL WILL ALWAYS WORK AS DESCRIBED, NOR DOES SIMPLY APPLIED ASSUME ANY RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY DAMAGES ASSOCIATED WITH CRITICALLâS PERFORMANCE OR FAILURE TO PERFORM. SIMPLY APPLIED'S LIABILITY IS LIMITED TO THE PURCHASE PRICE OF THE APP.Keywords - volume manager, ringtone manager, ringtones, notifications, notification manager, notification control, silence, silent, silent call, silent mode, silent text, silence phone, silent phone, quiet, quiet mode, silent ringtone, silent notifications, volume override, important calls, critical calls, SMS, silence ringer, SMS notifications, SMS ringtones, privacy, sleep, sleep control, Apple, Do Not Disturb

reviews.title: Good app+advice to user
reviews.comment: G2 the person immediately b if you want it 2 work as you described, consistently,perhaps set it to silent and leave it that way.
reviews.author: Chrystine RD

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It appears that this ONLY works is the phone is silenced. I need an app that ALWAYS overrides the ringer, tone, etc.
reviews.author: Dennis Locke

reviews.title: Repeatedly Loses VIPs
reviews.comment: I would mark a contact as a VIP and when I open the app again, some of the VIPs have been deselected as VIPs so I have to keep selecting them, which means the app might possibly ignore them if they were to call within the defined time ranges.
reviews.author: Kweku Adams

reviews.title: Evo4g lte!
reviews.comment: Great App!
reviews.author: wade morrison

reviews.title: No search function
reviews.comment: I have more than 1000 contacts in my phone and it\'s a hassle to scroll all the way to find them. Other than that, this app working great.
reviews.author: Andri Agassi

reviews.title: Very useful!
reviews.comment: Always works on my HTC One V :3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I use Timerific to mute the ringer while I\'m sleeping and yet I worried that my 80 yr old father would not be able to get ahold of me. Now I sleep knowing his call will get through and wake me. Thanks.
reviews.author: Robert Roush

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thanks fir a great app.
reviews.author: Rodney Miller

reviews.title: Where\'s the vibrate?
reviews.comment: It says that vibrate option was added, but can\'t find it anywhere!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work on gnex
reviews.comment: Not able to get it to work on my galaxy nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed.
reviews.comment: Tho this app is brilliant, it used to be better, the free trial version used to allow you 3 critical contacts with no expiary, now only allows 5 over-rides then expires. Pretty gutted cos this app is really good. Off to find a free one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy Nexus unfortunately
reviews.comment: Looks good though.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Great app. Great support.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works awesome. With all the fires going on in Texas i can be sure that others can communicate with me at all times so i can be prepared.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: as advertised! Haven\'t tested texts yet, but calls are perfect. Thank you for making it free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems to work on my Incredible. Too bad it doesn\'t work for SMS. Otherwise so far so good...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on X10. Uninstalled.

reviews.comment: Excellent.
